type.label: Portfolio
type.description: Portfolios reference projects. They can be used to build a PDF, containing: - A rendition of the referenced projects - A front page

type.label: Project
type.description: Projects can be used to generate financial reports with cost/gains, that will be used internally. They can also be referenced in portfolios to give prospects a look at what the company is able to do.

type.label: Intervention Statement
type.description: Statement that consultants have to bring back signed after an intervention at client's site

helpLabels.label: This text will be used as the portfolio's introduction in its front page.
Select projects to be referenced. Their metadata will be extracted when rendering the portfolio.

properties.property: SELECT * FROM nxtrProject WHERE dc:title ILIKE ? AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'

configuration.title: Header
configuration.description: The header widget just displays the widget label.
